Articles.Content:
For some time, I've wondered about making a ship that detects the positions of other ships (or parts of itself) to trigger action groups. Think the Sensor block from Space Engineers. Something enters it, and it triggers. Leaves again, and it un-triggers. Perhaps this could be integrated into Smart Parts, if kOS can't detect it. Maybe a cunning coder could look at solar panel occlusions and derive the position from that.

As per usual, if this mod exists, please link me to it.
Smart Parts has a proximity sensor now.

Thanks. After perusing the thread, I have found that this is nearly exactly what I want. I was hoping for something that would detect anything, not just a transceiver. Ah well, it'll do. Automatic garage doors, here I come!
